items.name: Get data

discovery_rules.name: Battery voltage discovery
discovery_rules.description: Discovery for Aranet Cloud Battery voltage sensors

trigger_prototypes.name: {#METRIC}: Critically low battery voltage on "[{#GATEWAY_NAME}] {#SENSOR_NAME}"
trigger_prototypes.event_name: {#METRIC}: Critically low battery voltage on "[{#GATEWAY_NAME}] {#SENSOR_NAME}" (below {$ARANET.BATT.VOLTAGE.MIN.CRIT:"{#SENSOR_NAME}"}{#UNIT} for 5m)

discovery_rules.description: Discovery for Aranet Cloud CO2 sensors

trigger_prototypes.name: {#METRIC}: Critically high CO2 level on "[{#GATEWAY_NAME}] {#SENSOR_NAME}"
trigger_prototypes.event_name: {#METRIC}: Critically high CO2 level on "[{#GATEWAY_NAME}] {#SENSOR_NAME}" (over {$ARANET.CO2.MAX.CRIT:"{#SENSOR_NAME}"}{#UNIT} for 5m)
